e-bomb.gloss: a bomb that explodes in midair and releases a massive burst of electromagnetic energy sufficient to disable computers and telecommunications without killing people or damaging buildings

e. b. white.gloss: United States writer noted for his humorous essays (1899-1985)

eb.gloss: a unit of information equal to 1000 petabits or 10^18 bits
a unit of information equal to 1000 petabytes or 10^18 bytes
a unit of information equal to 1024 pebibytes or 2^60 bytes

ebbing.gloss: a gradual decline (in size or strength or power or number)

ebenaceae.gloss: fruit and timber trees of tropical and warm regions including ebony and persimmon

ebenales.gloss: trees or shrubs of the families Ebenaceae or Sapotaceae or Styracaceae or Symplocaceae

ebionite.gloss: a member of a group of Jews who (during the early history of the Christian Church) accepted Jesus as the Messiah

ebit.gloss: a unit of information equal to 1000 petabits or 10^18 bits

ebitda.gloss: income before interest and taxes and depreciation and amortization have been subtracted

synonyms.word: earnings before interest taxes depreciation and amortization

ebn.gloss: the compass point that is one point north of due east

ebola.gloss: a severe and often fatal disease in humans and nonhuman primates (monkeys and chimpanzees) caused by the Ebola virus

ebola fever.gloss: a severe and often fatal disease in humans and nonhuman primates (monkeys and chimpanzees) caused by the Ebola virus

ebola hemorrhagic fever.gloss: a severe and often fatal disease in humans and nonhuman primates (monkeys and chimpanzees) caused by the Ebola virus

ebonics.gloss: a nonstandard form of American English characteristically spoken by African Americans in the United States

ebonite.gloss: a hard nonresilient rubber formed by vulcanizing natural rubber

ebony family.gloss: fruit and timber trees of tropical and warm regions including ebony and persimmon

ebony spleenwort.gloss: common North American fern with polished black stripes

ebony tree.gloss: tropical tree of southern Asia having hard dark-colored heartwood used in cabinetwork

ebs.gloss: the compass point that is one point south of due east

ebullience.gloss: overflowing with eager enjoyment or approval

eburophyton.gloss: a monocotyledonous genus of the family Orchidaceae

eburophyton austinae.gloss: waxy white nearly leafless plant with stems in clusters and racemes of white flowers

ebv.gloss: the herpes virus that causes infectious mononucleosis

ebonise.gloss: stain black to make it look like ebony

ebonize.gloss: stain black to make it look like ebony
